title: Quiet Mental Chatter Hatha
description: This practice explores three techniques to quiet your mind: focusing on sensory feedback, establishing steady gazing points, and flowing through rhythmic movement. Start with seated meditation before transitioning through Lunge Salutations, standing balances, inversions, mild backbends, and seated forward folds. Postures include Garudasana (Eagle Pose), Revolved Half Moon, Headstand, Camel Pose, and Janu Sirasana (Head-To-Knee Forward Fold). This class previously aired on January 27, 2025.

title: Gentle Morning Vinyasa
description: Ease into movement and wake up slowly in this whole-body morning flow. Start your day without feeling rushed in a feel-good sequence with Lunge Salutations, side-body openers, an Eagle Pose variation, Pigeon Pose with a quad opener, Child’s Pose variations, and rolling Bridge Pose. This class previously aired on January 29, 2025.

title: Flow For Absolute Beginners
description: Learn the basics of Vinyasa Flow yoga in this class that introduces the most essential postures while stretching, strengthening, and moving your entire body. With approachable and understandable instruction, you’ll explore Half Sun Salutations, Down Dog, Plank Pose, Warrior II, Triangle Pose, and Half Moon Pose. Welcome to your practice! This class previously aired on January 20, 2025.

title: Post-Workout Stretch: Hips & Shoulders
description: This practice includes 10 minutes of straightforward hip openers and 10 minutes of straightforward shoulder openers. It’s a satisfying way to find space in your body after a workout. Postures include Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose), Low Lunge with a quad stretch, an Ankle-To-Knee Pose variation, Eagle Arms, and a chest opener. This class previously aired on January 22, 2025.

title: Calming Hatha
description: Just twenty minutes to calm. This simple, soothing practice helps release stress with long-held Down Dogs, seated twists, mindful side bends, simple shoulder openers, and an optional inversion. Enjoy this relaxing sequence to recalibrate your entire being and return whenever you need to unwind tension. This class previously aired on January 15, 2025.

title: Balance Boost Hatha
description: This Hatha practice helps you refine your balancing postures by emphasizing fundamentals, like maintaining an active base, engaging your outer hips, and focusing on your center line. The steady sequence features standing, cross-body, seated, and hand balances, including Ardha Chandrasana (Half Moon), Warrior III, Utthita Hasta Padangusthasana (Standing Big Toe Pose), Bakasana (Crow Pose), and Pincha Mayurasana (Forearm Balance). This class previously aired on January 8, 2025.

title: Everyday Essentials Flow
description: Welcome to your new daily flow. This go-to practice focuses on four essential movements that your body requires to stay strong and mobile: core strengthening, back strengthening, hip mobility, and shoulder mobility. The energizing sequence includes variations in Plank, Sun Salutations, Pigeon, and standing poses. This class previously aired on January 13, 2025.

title: Self-Care Holiday Hatha
description: Unwind tension and embrace time to yourself in this self-soothing Hatha practice. Enjoy a slow pace with the opportunity to go deep in postures, reaching your entire body in Lizard Lunge, Happy Baby, Reclined Twist, Low Lunge with a quad-opener, the option for an inversion, and an outer-hip opener. This class previously aired on December 25, 2024.

title: Fresh Start Flow
description: This quick flow strengthens and mobilizes your whole body. You'll move through a balanced, foundational sequence with Lunge Salutations, Side Plank, Warrior II, Triangle, Bridge, and shoulder openers to feel refreshed from head to toe. It’s an excellent express practice to welcome a new day, new energy, or new habit. This class previously aired on January 6, 2025.

title: Strong & Flexible Flow
description: This Vinyasa flow strengthens and lengthens your body where you may need it most — shoulders, hips, hamstrings, and quads. In a methodical sequence, explore variations in Plank, Push Ups, Dolphin Pose, Lunges, Warrior III, Locust, Upavistha Konasana (Wide-Legged Seated Forward Fold), and Gate Pose. This class previously aired on December 23, 2024.

title: Winter Flow
description: Just what you need to keep moving on cold, idle days, this feel-good flow is full of hip openers, twists, core strengtheners, and shoulder openers. Enjoy an energizing sequence with Sun Salutations, a Revolved Triangle variation, Garudasana (Eagle Pose) variations, Revolved Heron’s Pose, Firelog Pose, Pigeon variations, and Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fish Pose). This class previously aired on December 18, 2024.

title: Longevity Flow For Balance & Coordination
description: This effective flow considers your longevity by emphasizing essential components of balancing: active feet, strong hips, and a powerful core. You’ll build your coordination with cross-body and stability-focused variations in Bird Dog, Tree Pose, Garudasana (Eagle Pose), Half Moon, Warrior III, and Lunge with a twist. This class previously aired on December 16, 2024.

title: New Year's Flow
description: Ring in the New Year with this long-form Vinyasa practice that focuses on taking care of *you,* leaving you feeling good, focused, and grounded. Flow for 60 minutes in a continuous, integrated sequence, then enjoy long-held poses for the last 15 minutes. Postures in the flow include Crescent, Down Dog variations, Warrior II, Warrior III, Dolphin, and Pincha Mayurasana (Forearm Balance); finishing postures include seated hip-openers, like Happy Baby and Shoelace Pose. This class previously aired on January 1, 2025.

title: Flow For Hips & Spine
description: This methodical Vinyasa practice takes your hips and spine through their full range of motion, leaving you feeling open, spacious, and content. Flow through a strong sequence with Pigeon variations, Visvamitrasana (a challenging balance), Gate Pose, Side Crow, Revolved Half Moon, Camel variations, and quad openers. This class previously aired on December 11, 2024.

title: Slow Flow For Busy Professionals
description: This slow flow is a go-to antidote for modern life and all its stressors. Step onto your mat and enjoy flowing through Low Lunge with a quad stretch, Crescent Lunge, Lunge with a twist, a Locust variation, and a Bridge variation. You’ll open your shoulders and hips while strengthening your back body, helping to support healthy posture. This class previously aired on December 9, 2024.

title: Total Body Functional Flow
description: This strong, comprehensive practice embraces nuance and detail. You’ll explore modern techniques that encourage poses to be more effective and efficient for your body. Start with shoulder and hip mobilization, then flow through variations in Bow Pose, Dancer Pose, Revolved Triangle, Crow Pose, and Astavakrasana (Eight-Angle Pose). This class previously aired on December 4, 2024.

title: Restore Your Core
description: This Vinyasa practice features solid core strengtheners throughout dynamic Sun Salutations from beginning to end. Expect to feel some heat in Half Boat Pose, Reclined Crow Pose, Reclined Side Crow, Forearm Plank, Marching Plank, and Locust variations. This class previously aired on December 2, 2024.

title: Holiday Slow Flow
description: Unwind tension throughout your entire body in this slow flow, which serves as a great reminder to take time for yourself during the hustle and bustle of the holiday season. Gently open your shoulders, hips, and back in Anjaneyasana (Crescent), Ardha Hanumanasana (Half Split), Cat/Cow variations, Seated Side Bends, and relaxing Salutations. This class previously aired on November 27, 2024.

title: Lower-Body-Focused Flow
description: Strengthen and mobilize your hips, hamstrings, and quads in this steady Vinyasa class. Explore 90/90 transitions, Pigeon variations, quad openers, Squat variations, Hanumanasana (Splits) variations, and Double Pigeon Pose for a thoughtfully sequenced flow dedicated to your lower body. This class previously aired on November 25, 2024.

title: Daily Hatha For Body & Mind
description: This go-to, everyday practice opens your hips and shoulders while grounding your nervous system and focusing your mind. Nurture your entire being in a steady sequence with Anjaneyasana (Crescent), Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose), Tree Pose, Triangle Pose, Gate Pose, Headstand, Shoulderstand, and Pigeon Pose. This class previously aired on November 20, 2024.

title: Quick Pick-Me-Up Flow
description: This strong, up-tempo flow gets moving without feeling rushed. It’s full of Sun Salutation variations, standing pose flows, and arm balances to wake up your body and clear your mind. Peak poses include Side Plank, Side Crow, Camel, and Upward Bow. This class previously aired on November 13, 2024.

title: Upper-Body-Focused Flow
description: From full-range openers to arm balances, this higher-level flow strengthens, mobilizes, and stretches your entire upper body. Explore a powerful sequence with scapular Push Ups, Garudasana and Gomukhasana variations, Marching Plank, Bound Side Angle, Vasisthasana, and Bakasana. This class previously aired on November 18, 2024.

title: Shoulder & Hip Recovery Hatha
description: Full of active range mobility practices, foam rolling, and stretches, this class is designed to help your body recover from a challenging practice or training day. Grab your foam roller and begin by rolling your hips, then move slowly through 90/90 variations, Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose) variations, Garudasana (Eagle Pose) variations, and more foam rolling for your upper back. This class previously aired on November 8, 2024.

title: Immunity Boost Hatha
description: This Hatha practice encourages a patient pace, allowing you to move without draining your battery. You’ll focus on improving circulation, opening your chest (to help effective breathing), and reducing stress — all critical factors to support your immunity. Postures include Down Dog, Gate Pose, Ardha Matsyendrasana (Half Lord of the Fish Pose), Seated Side Bends, and Shoulderstand. This class previously aired on November 11, 2024.

title: Get Ready For Your Day Flow
description: This dynamic, morning-friendly flow opens your shoulders, hips, and quads while preparing your mind and mood to take on the day. Wake up in an energizing, higher-level sequence that includes Sun Salutations with side bends, Humble Warrior, Side Plank variations, Eka Pada Rajakapotasana (King Pigeon Pose), and a One-Legged Backbend. This class previously aired on November 6, 2024.

title: Morning Slow Flow
description: Get moving without feeling rushed in this practice that unwinds your shoulders, hips, and spine. Enjoy less cueing to savor quiet moments in the morning as you flow through variations of Anjaneyasana, Half Split, Sun Salutations, Half Moon, and Bridge. This class previously aired on October 28, 2024.

title: Keep The Fire Flow
description: Warm yourself up in this strong, up-tempo flow featuring core strengthening, arm balancing, and standing pose flows. Start with reclined core work, Plank, and Forearm Plank, then keep establishing heat in Sun Salutations, Bakasana (Crow Pose), Eka Pada Koundinyasana, and Hanumanasana (Splits). This class previously aired on October 23, 2024.

title: Standing Balance Flow
description: This higher-level practice journeys through a dynamic, creative flow of standing balances that strengthen and open your body while focusing your mind. Move through balancing Plank, ankle-to-knee Utkatasana (Chair Pose), Gomukhasana variations, Tree Pose, Utthita Hasta Padangusthasana (Standing Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose), Natarajasana (Dancer Pose), Warrior III, and Half Moon. This class previously aired on November 4, 2024.

title: Relaxed, Calm, & Content Hatha
description: Feel relaxed, calm, and content after gliding through this soothing, grounded practice full of hip and hamstring openers. Enjoy a slow pace through Happy Baby, Reclined Twists, Anjaneyasana (Crescent), Pigeon, Wide-Legged Forward Fold, Shoulderstand, Janu Sirsasana (Head-To-Knee Forward Fold), and Constructive Rest Pose. This class previously aired on October 16, 2024.

title: Everything In 30 Flow
description: This go-to practice incorporates all the Vinyasa flow favorites: Sun Salutation variations, core strengtheners, standing postures, shoulder openers, and more. Enjoy a balanced, complete sequence with peak postures of Bow Pose, Wide-Legged Side Bend, Revolved Half Moon, and Warrior III. This class previously aired on October 14, 2024.

title: Everyday Hatha
description: Strengthen and mobilize your entire body in this go-to Hatha practice that's great for any and all days of the week. Move steadily through a balanced, complete sequence with reclined leg and hip openers, Lunges with shoulder openers, Padahastasana (Forward Fold variation), a Warrior series, Double Pigeon, and Shoulderstand to round out. This class previously aired on September 30, 2024.

title: Whole-Body Tune-Up Flow
description: This Vinyas practice strengthens and tones while helping your whole body work together with integrity and cohesion. Flow through reclined abdominal work, Plank variations, Sun Salutations, Side Plank variations, Warrior Pose variations, and Bridge to finish energized and full of power. This class previously aired on October 9, 2024.

title: Autumn Adventure Flow
description: Prepare for a new season and break free from your routine with this Vinyasa flow. Discover new depths in your practice as you explore a variety of poses that test your strength, flexibility, and balance. Expect to work your core, arms, and legs with ab-work, a standing balance series, and challenging transitions, including Half Moon to Malasana (Squat) and Crow Pose to Headstand. This class previously aired on October 7, 2024.

title: Yang Yin For Flexibility & Strength
description: This practice perfectly combines strength, flexibility, movement, and stillness. Focus on long, strong holds for the first 30 minutes, then finish with slow, deep opening postures to unravel and unwind. Highlights include Plank variations, Utkatasana (Chair Pose) variations, Warrior variations, Pigeon Pose, Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose), and Wide-Legged Forward Fold. This class previously aired on September 25, 2024.

title: Calm & Collected Hatha
description: When your mind feels scattered, turn to this Hatha practice to soothe your nervous system and ground your thoughts. You’ll move steadily through front-body-openers, hip-openers, and forward folds to finish feeling calm and collected. Postures include Low Lunge with quad stretch, Half Bow Pose, Pigeon, an inversion option, Janu Sirsasana (Head-To-Knee Forward Fold), and Ardha Matseyendrasana (Seated Twist). This class previously aired on September 18, 2024.

title: Recharge Flow
description: Reinvigorate your body in this steady, up-tempo flow with continuous movement from beginning to end. Move briskly through a strong flow of Sun Salutation variations, including Lunging Surya Namaskar, Surya Namaskar A and B, Warrior I, Humble Warrior, Boat Pose, Ardha Ustrasana (Half Camel Pose), and Upward Bow Pose. This class previously aired on September 23, 2024.

title: Classic Vinyasa Flow
description: This higher-level Vinyasa class is inspired by the Ashtanga Primary Series. It’s a strong, full-body practice that features the original sequence with a few modern updates to increase your focus and stamina. Highlights include Surya Namaskar A, Surya Namaskar B, Uttihita Hasta Padangusthana (Extended Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose), Standing Splits, Bakasana (Crow Pose), Vasisthasana (Side Plank), Headstand, and Shoulderstand. This class previously aired on October 2, 2024.

title: Support For Seasonal Transitions Restorative
description: Ease the transition into autumn or winter in this Restorative practice that tends to your body and mind while relaxing your nervous system. Grab a blanket and slowly move through Supta Baddha Konasana (Bound Angle Pose), Supported Reclined Twist, and Supported Forward Folds before landing in Savasana. This class previously aired on October 21, 2024.

title: Slow Flow To Unwind
description: Find inner calm in this mellow Vinyasa practice full of nourishing postures that unwind your body, soothe your nervous system, and quiet your mind. Focus on opening your hips, shoulders, and lower back in a slow flow with Seated Straddle, Bound Angle Pose, Forward Folds, Standing Split, Vishnu’s Couch variation, Half Moon, Malasana (Squat), and Half Lotus. This class previously aired on September 16, 2024.

title: Psoas Release Hatha
description: Release deeply-held tension in your psoas and surrounding areas in this mild, slow practice that takes a patient approach. You’ll focus on effective lengthening and essential details to leave your psoas less reactive and more supple. Poses include Crescent variations, Supta Baddha Konasana, and Supported Savasana. This class previously aired on September 11, 2024.

title: Beginner-Intermediate Flow
description: This steady, balanced Vinyasa practice includes a wide range of options to satisfy new and seasoned practitioners alike. You’ll build full-body strength and mobility in an energizing flow with Sun Salutations, core work, Triangle Pose, Half Moon, and Seated Twists. This class previously aired on September 9, 2024.

title: Hatha For Hips
description: Increase flexibility and mobility in your hips with this Hatha practice. It's full of effective poses and modern variations that will leave you wanting to come back time and time again. Start with reclined hip mobilization and a four-part Pigeon Pose series, then move through Lizard Lunge, Gomukhasana variations, Ankle-To-Knee variations, and Janu Sirsasana (Head-To-Knee Forward Fold). This class previously aired on September 4, 2024.

title: Slow Flow: Upper Body
description: This slow flow gives you a few extra breaths to savor a wide array of shoulder and back openers. Enjoy upper body variations in a steady sequence with Lunges, Sphinx, Bound Reverse Warrior, Bound Side Angle, and Prasarita Padottanasana (Wide-Legged Standing Forward Fold). This class previously aired on August 19, 2024.

title: Advanced Vinyasa
description: Find your edge and challenge yourself (without going overboard) in this fun, all-around flow that offers space to tackle more advanced postures. In a strong sequence, explore Bird of Paradise, Bound Half Moon, Flying Pigeon, Tripod Headstand, Hanumanasana, Bakasana to Chaturanga, Standing Splits, and Eka Pada Rajakapotasana (King Pigeon Pose). This class previously aired on August 28, 2024.

title: Midday Recharge Vinyasa
description: Get out of your head and into your body in this higher-level Vinyasa practice; it’s the perfect midday pick-me-up. Flow through a fun, playful sequence with Surya Namaskar A variations with core strengtheners, Surya Namaskar B variations with shoulder openers, standing poses, Handstand options, hip-openers, and Camel Pose variations. This class previously aired on August 21, 2024.

title: My Go-To Vinyasa Flow
description: This fun, mid-tempo flow keeps you moving and includes just enough demanding poses to inspire you to find your edge without going over. The comprehensive sequence has a little bit of everything, including reclined core work, Surya Namaskar variations, Half Moon variations, Standing Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose, Vasisthasana variations, Handstand options, and Compass Pose. This class previously aired on September 2, 2024.

title: Hatha For Hips & Spine
description: Develop the flexibility your body craves in this focused, freeing Hatha practice. You’ll move your spine and hips through their full range of motion and explore longer holds. Postures include Double Pigeon, Gomukhasana, Pigeon Pose variations, Anjaneyasana with side bends, Parivrtta Janu Sirsasana (Revolved Head-To-Knee Forward Fold), and Ardha Matseyendrasana (Seated Twist/Half Lord of the Fish Pose). This class previously aired on August 12, 2024.

title: Grounding Hatha For Teachers
description: Yoga teachers, this class helps you savor being a student again. It’s a simple, grounding sequence that allows you to focus on your body, care for yourself, and surrender. Enjoy taking your time through a seated shoulder-opening sequence, Dolphin, Lunging Surya Namaskar, Hanumanasana, Prasarita Padottanasana, Handstand, Forearm Balance, Headstand, and Shoulderstand. This class previously aired on August 7, 2024.

title: Get Moving Flow
description: Stop the search; this Vinyasa class is just what you need to get your body moving. Enjoy a steady, balanced flow with Lunging Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutations), Revolved Utkatasana (Chair Pose), Warrior I with shoulder openers, Revolved Side Angle, a Pigeon variation, and Heron’s Pose. This class previously aired on August 14, 2024.

title: Yoga For Introverts
description: Designed for those who tend to recharge with alone time and inner experiences, this practice allows you to turn inward and take a break from overstimulation. It’s demanding enough to focus your attention and soothing enough to settle your nervous system. Expect various forward folds and longer holds in a grounding sequence with Lizard Lunge, Dolphin, Wide-Legged Forward Fold, Headstand, Plough Pose, and seated meditation. This class previously aired on July 31, 2024.

title: Unwind Hips & Shoulders Flow
description: This mid-tempo practice opens your shoulders and hips to leave you feeling comfortable, calm, and content. Flow steadily through variations in Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose), Anjaneyasana (Crescent), Garudasana (Eagle Pose), Down Dog, Bound Side Angle, Bound Triangle, and Pigeon to release tightness in those areas that can hang on to tension. This class previously aired on July 29, 2024.

title: Quick Flow Break
description: Take a quick break for yoga in this flowing sequence that will leave you clear-headed and feeling better than before. Open your shoulders, back, and quads in Lunging Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutations), Revolved Utkatasana (Chair), Warrior I, Revolved Triangle, Side-Lying Bow Pose, One-Legged Bridge, and Pigeon Pose. It’s a perfect pick-me-up! This class previously aired on August 5, 2024.

title: Slow Burn Flow
description: This powerful slow flow focuses on building strength and stamina in your core, shoulders, arms, and legs. Find longer holds and controlled transitions to challenge your body while enhancing your skill. Highlights include Plank and Forearm Plank variations, reclined core strengtheners, standing poses, slow Salutations, Dolphin Pose, and Boat Pose. This class previously aired on July 15, 2024.

title: Bakasana Breakdown Flow
description: This class perfectly balances a flowing practice and a technique breakdown. Enjoy a strengthening, full-body sequence while building skills for Bakasana (Crow Pose). More highlights include Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation) variations, Down Dog variations, Humble Warrior, and different variations of Bakasana, like Seated Bakasana and Reclined Bakasana. This class previously aired on July 10, 2024.

title: Invigorating Morning Flow
description: Wake up and get moving in this dynamic flow featuring a progression of Sun Salutations, standing postures, arm balances, and shoulder openers. Flow through Side Plank variations, Warrior III, Handstand and Forearm Balance options, core strengtheners, and One-Legged Upward Bow to start your day strong. This class previously aired on July 17, 2024.

title: Slow Flow: Lower Body
description: This slow flow hits the sweet spots in your lower body to open your hips, lengthen your hamstrings, and release your quads. In a steady yet unhurried sequence, move through Pigeon, Gomukhasana variations, Skandasana (Side Lunge), Lizard Lunge variations, and Standing Ankle-To-Knee Pose to finish feeling grounded and mobile. This class previously aired on August 26, 2024.

title: Calm & Quiet Evening Hatha
description: Here’s your relaxing antidote to a long, stressful day. Enjoy a mellow sequence of reclined and seated hip openers, twists, and shoulder openers, including Happy Baby, Reclined Twist, Lizard Lunge with a side bend, Pigeon Pose, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on July 8, 2024.

title: Meditation Preparation Hatha
description: This soothing Hatha sequence is full of hip and shoulder openers to prepare your body for your seated meditation practice. It’s also perfect for unwinding tension from a stressful day. Move slowly through seated side bends, Lizard Lunge, Anjaneyasana, Down Dog, Wide-Legged Standing Forward Fold, Gomukhasana, and Ardha Matseyendrasana (Seated Twist). This class previously aired on July 1, 2024.

title: Quiet & Reflective Hatha
description: This minimal-instruction practice opens your shoulders and hips while offering space in longer holds to savor much-needed quiet time. Start with seated meditation, then move slowly through a grounding sequence with Prasarita Padottanasana (Wide-Legged Standing Forward Fold), Uttanasana (Standing Forward Fold), Pigeon Pose, and Parivrtta Janu Sirsasana (Revolved Head-To-Knee Forward Fold). This class previously aired on June 26, 2024.

title: Just Flow
description: This strong, dynamic practice with minimal instruction keeps you moving from beginning to end and provides space for your own variations. Flow through Surya Namaskar, Handstand and Forearm Balance options, Bakasana and Parsva Bakasana (Crow and Side Crow), reclined core strengtheners, and backbends, including Camel Pose. Bonus: Enjoy options and sequencing that are different from any other class Jason has taught on Glo! This class previously aired on July 8, 2024.

title: Screen Time Unwind Hatha
description: This practice unwinds the stress of sitting, perfect after a long day at your desk. Enjoy a mild sequence full of shoulder, hip, and upper back openings, helping to improve your posture and refresh your mind. Highlights include variations in Puppy Pose, Lunging twists, Anjaneyasana, Pigeon Pose, and Parighasana (Gate Pose). This class previously aired on June 25, 2024.

title: Vinyasa For Vitality
description: This powerful, dynamic flow features a progression of full-body strengtheners, arm balances, and backbends. Cultivate vitality while flowing through Vasisthasana (Side Plank) and Plank variations, a Warrior Pose series, Forearm Balance, one-legged backbends, Bakasana (Crow Pose), and Parsva Bakasana (Side Crow Pose). This class previously aired on June 24, 2024.

title: Yoga For Busy Bodies
description: Rather than being rushed or feeling forced to slow down, this quick class provides continuous, unhurried movement and breath to honor where you’re at. You’ll open your shoulders, release your hips, and move in a steady rhythm to finish refreshed in body and mind. Highlights include One-Legged Down Dog variations, Crescent Lunge, Humble Warrior variations, side-bending Triangle, side-lying Bow Pose, and Pigeon. This class previously aired on June 12, 2024.

title: Supple Spine Flow
description: This Vinyasa flow helps increase spinal flexibility by moving in all directions — twists, side bends, back bends, forward bends, and gentle traction. Enjoy an energizing sequence with Lunging Surya Namaskar (Sun Salutation) and variations in Revolved Triangle, Ardha Matsyendrasana II (seated twist), Side Plank, Gate Pose, and Camel Pose. This class previously aired on June 10, 2024.

title: Wrist Warm-Up & Flow
description: This Vinyasa class warms up your wrists and strengthens your forearms. It’s an energizing standalone sequence and is also great for preparing for an arm balance and inversion practice. Flow steadily through Plank, Crescent Lunge, Utkatasana (Chair Pose), and Warrior II, with forearm, hand, and wrist variations throughout. This class previously aired on June 19, 2024.

title: Well-Rounded Flow
description: This comprehensive flow takes a fresh approach different from the norm. Instead of conventional standing poses, you’ll focus on Lunge variations, core strengtheners, and seated hip-openers throughout Sun Salutations. Postures include Lizard Lunge, Dolphin Pose, Gomukhasana variations), and Parivrrta Janu Sirsasana (Revolved Head-To-Knee Forward Fold). This class previously aired on June 3, 2024.

title: Wake Up Morning Flow
description: This is a perfect mid-tempo, moderate-intensity Vinyasa practice to shed sleepiness and start your day. Flow through a breath-led, dynamic sequence with variations to stretch your shoulders, hips, and spine in Anjaneyasana, Lunging Sun Salutations, Camel Pose, Utkatasana (Chair Pose), and Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose). This class previously aired on June 5, 2024.

title: Rejuvenating Twists Flow
description: This Vinyasa class focuses on twisting from the rotational muscles in your spine and core to take a more functional approach to your practice. You’ll flow through lots of revolved postures standing and seated, core work, a good amount of arm balances, and backbends or forward folds to finish. Postures include Revolved Crescent, Planks, Astavakrasana (Eight-Angle Pose), Boat Pose, Side Crow, and Eka Pada Koundinyasana I (arm balance). This class previously aired on May 22, 2024.

title: Hatha Express
description: From side bends to twists and hip and shoulder openers, this practice meets all of your Hatha yoga needs in a short amount of time. Without feeling rushed, move through Crescent Lunge, Low Lunge Salutations, Revolved Triangle, Dolphin Pose, and an inversion option before rounding out in Bridge Pose. This class previously aired on May 6, 2024.

title: Deep Core Connect Flow
description: Target your anterior abdominals and pelvic floor in this strong, sweaty, core-focused sequence. You’ll flow through Plank variations, Lolasana (arm balance), Forearm Balance, and ab-strengthening postures, like Boat Pose variations. This class previously aired on May 13, 2024.

title: Deep Release Slow Flow
description: This is the perfect practice to unwind, with just enough movement to stay focused and engaged. Enjoy a relaxing, slow flow with 90/90 variations, Heron’s Pose, Lizard Lunge, Vishnu’s Couch (Sleeping Buddha), Wide-Legged Forward Fold, and Pigeon Pose variations to release every ounce of stress and tension in your body. This class previously aired on April 29, 2024.

title: Hatha For Restful Sleep
description: Prepare for a restful night’s sleep in this gentle Hatha sequence that releases tension in your hips, back, and shoulders while staying low to the ground. Move through a calm, relaxing sequence with Cross-Legged Forward Fold and Side Bend, Gate Pose, modified Upavistha Konasana (Wide-Legged Seated Forward Fold), Gomukhasana variations, Seated Twist, and Child’s Pose. This class previously aired on April 24, 2024.

title: Ignite Upper Body Strength Flow
description: Build upper body strength with fresh, uncommon flow transitions in this challenging Vinyasa practice. Move through an energizing sequence with Chaturanga Push Up variations, Dolphin Push Up variations, One-Legged Dolphin, Forearm Side Plank, Handstand, and Forearm Balance to finish with a sweat. This class previously aired on May 1, 2024.

title: Align & Refine Functional Flow
description: This practice perfectly blends technique with fluidity. You’ll explore details and nuances of postures while savoring a steady, mid-paced tempo. Flow through Crescent Lunge with active range of motion shoulder openers, Lunging Sun Salutations, standing twists, Bow Pose variations, Janu Sirsasana variations, and Heron’s Pose. This class previously aired on May 15, 2024.

title: Feel Good Yang Yin
description: Embrace the best of both worlds — yang and yin. Start with a dynamic Vinyasa sequence to build full-body strength and mobility, then ease into slow, long-held Yin postures to soothe the nervous system and quiet your mind. The flow includes Sun Salutation variations, Standing Forward Fold, and Humble Warrior variations, then relax into Pigeon, Gomukhasana, and Janu Sirsasana. This class previously aired on May 8, 2024.

title: Release Shoulder Tension Hatha
description: Welcome to your new, go-to shoulder-focused practice. You’ll unwind and release tension not just in your shoulders but also in your neck and upper back. Enjoy a relaxing sequence with dynamic Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose), dynamic Garudasana (Eagle Pose), Puppy Pose, Half Bound Side Angle, Half Bound Half Moon, and Broken Wing Pose to finish feeling more comfortable in your upper body. This class previously aired on April 10, 2024.

title: Inversions For Beginners
description:
Lay your foundation for the four primary inversions: Handstand, Forearm Balance, Headstand, and Shoulderstand. This tutorial-style class is more of a lesson but keeps you flowing. Explore preparations, transitions, and alternatives for each inversion with the opportunity to go upside down if you’re ready. This class previously aired on April 15, 2024.

We apologize for the audio quality of this video, however this class is still audible.

title: Arm Balances For Beginners Flow
description: Develop the insight and skills to confidently unlock arm balances in this focused flow that explores drills in Side Plank, Bakasana (Crow Pose), and Side Crow Pose. You’ll practice variations in each of these postures to learn the fundamentals and flow through some Lunging Sun Salutations. This class previously aired on April 8, 2024.

title: Flow For Hips & Spine
description: Flow smoothly from beginning to end of this hip- and spine-focused practice that leaves your body spacious, open, and free. Explore controlled articular rotations, 90/90 transitions, Lunging Sun Salutations, Revolved Triangle, Parighasana (Gate Pose), Skandasana (Side Lunge), Half Moon to Malasana (Squat), and Heron Pose. This class previously aired on April 3, 2024.

title: Beginner Full-Body Flow
description: This practice strengthens and opens your entire body in a comprehensive sequence accessible to yoga newcomers. Start with Bird Dog, Down Dog, and Forearm Plank, then flow through Lunging Sun Salutations, Half Moon, Warrior II, and Boat Pose before finishing with hip openers. This class previously aired on April 22, 2024.

title: Healthy Aging Series: Optimize Flexibility
description:
Welcome to Jason’s Healthy Aging Series! This final installment is a perfect practice to improve hamstring, hip, quad, and shoulder flexibility, enhancing mobility and comfort on and off the mat. Move through a steady sequence with reclined lower-body openers, Low Lunge variations, Pigeon Pose variations, Gomukhasana variations, and Reclined Twists. This class previously aired on March 27, 2024. 

This is the fourth class of Jason’s four-class Healthy Aging Series, designed to support longevity, well-being, and vitality as the body matures. Each 45-minute Level 1-2 class focuses on one topic at a time, covering strength, mobility, balance, and flexibility.

title: Healthy Aging Series: Optimize Balance
description:
Welcome to Jason’s Healthy Aging Series! This third installment focuses on balancing in three ways: standing balances, lateral balances, and balancing effort equally throughout your body. You'll support your practice and feel steady off the mat. Postures include Bird Dog, Locust, Lunge Salutation variations, Tree Pose, Gomukhasana, Ardha Chandrasana (Half Moon), Warrior 3, and Side Plank. This class previously aired on March 20, 2024. 

This is the third class of Jason’s four-class Healthy Aging Series, designed to support longevity, well-being, and vitality as the body matures. Each 45-minute Level 1-2 class focuses on one topic at a time, covering strength, mobility, balance, and flexibility.

title: Backbends For Beginners Flow
description: Whether new to yoga or a seasoned practitioner refining your fundamentals, this methodical class suits you. You’ll strengthen your back body, open your front body, and practice the most essential backbends. Flow steadily through Crescent Lunge, Low Lunge with a quad stretch, Locust Pose, Cobra Pose, Sphinx Pose, Camel Pose, and Bridge Pose. This class previously aired on April 1, 2024.

title: End Your Day Hatha
description: Cap off your day with this relaxing, stress-releasing practice. You’ll unwind tension throughout your entire body, specifically the back, shoulders, and hips. Move through a slow, gentle sequence with Sphinx Pose, Anjaneyasana, a Janu Sirsasana variation (Head-To-Knee Forward Fold), Gomukhasana variations (Cow Face Pose), and a Reclined Twist to finish. This class previously aired on March 25, 2024.

title: Deepen Your Practice Flow
description:
Up-level your Vinyasa practice in this class with the opportunity to work on challenging postures without feeling overwhelmed or rushed. Start by opening your shoulders and hips, then flow through a strong sequence with Utthita Hasta Padangusthasana (Extended Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose), Standing Splits, Hanumansana (Splits), Pincha Mayurasana (Forearm Balance), Handstand, and Eka Pada Rajakapotasana (One-Legged King Pigeon Pose). This class previously aired on April 17, 2024.

We apologize for the audio quality of this video, however this class is still audible.

title: Healthy Aging Series: Optimize Mobility
description:
Welcome to Jason’s Healthy Aging Series! This second installment increases mobility in your hips, shoulders, and spine, leaving you feeling fresh and comfortable. Enjoy a seamless flow with lots of dynamic movements in side bends and twists, Eagle and Gomukhasana arm variations, Lunge Salutations, and Locust. This class previously aired on March 13, 2024.

This is the second class of Jason’s four-class Healthy Aging Series, designed to support longevity, well-being, and vitality as the body matures. Each 45-minute Level 1-2 class focuses on one topic at a time, covering strength, mobility, balance, and flexibility.

title: Start Your Day Flow
description: Mobilize your body and boost your energy, preparing for the day in this dynamic flow. Enjoy a strong, steady, and balanced sequence with Anjeneyasana, Lunge Salutations, Revolved Chair Pose, Forearm Plank, Fallen Triangle, an Eka Pada Rajakapotasana variation, and Wheel Pose. This class previously aired on March 18, 2024.

title: Healthy Aging Series: Optimize Strength
description:
Welcome to Jason’s Healthy Aging Series! This first installment provides effective methods to build long-lasting strength in your whole body, emphasizing the glutes, core, spinal muscles, and shoulders. Flow through an energizing sequence with Bird Dog variations, Forearm and Side Plank, Locust Pose, Lunge Salutations, Warrior I and II with arm variations, and One-Legged Bridge. This class previously aired on March 6, 2024. 

This is the first class of Jason’s four-class Healthy Aging Series, designed to support longevity, well-being, and vitality as the body matures. Each 45-minute Level 1-2 class focuses on one topic at a time, covering strength, mobility, balance, and flexibility.

title: Breath-Infused Hatha For Clarity
description: Feel calm, focused, and clear after moving through this sequence of simple, accessible movement patterns that help you breathe slowly and smoothly. Find relaxation gliding through Half Sun Salutations, Cat/Cow, Low Lunges, rolling Bridge, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on February 28, 2024.

title: Calm & Effective Slow Flow
description: Unwind tension throughout your entire body while moving just enough to stay centered and focused. This class is the ultimate slow flow to take your time and feel good. Highlights include Cross-Legged Forward Bend variations, Kneeling Twist, Lunge Salutations, Crescent with a side bend and twist, and Pigeon Pose. This class previously aired on March 4, 2024.

title: Brain Boost Flow
description: Cultivate greater focus, clarity, and calm in this practice that gets your whole body moving and facilitates circulation. Explore a dynamic flow with a steady stream of standing forward bends and inversions woven together seamlessly. Postures include Halasana (Plough Pose) to Forward Folds, Utkatasana (Chair Pose) to Malasana (Squat), Forearm Balance, Handstand, Headstand, and Shoulderstand. This class previously aired on March 11, 2024.

title: Functional Flow For Shoulders
description: Build strength and coordination to help your shoulders feel good and function optimally. This Vinyasa flow keeps you moving and breathing while practicing mobility-focused variations in Garudasana (Eagle Pose), Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose), faux Pull Ups, Locust, and binds. This class previously aired on February 26, 2024.

title: Fiery Winter Flow
description: Warm yourself up in this strong, higher-level Vinyasa practice that keeps you moving and is perfect for the colder months. Have fun flowing through Side Plank, Sun Salutations A and B, core strengthening, Bakasana variations (Crow Pose), Handstand, and one-legged backbend variations. This class previously aired on February 21, 2024.

title: Functional Flow For Core
description: Strengthen your entire core — abdominals, spinal muscles, and pelvic floor — in this powerful and to-the-point sequence. Flow through variations in Forearm Plank, Locust Pose, Chair Pose, Boat Pose, and Revolved Lunge to finish energized and strong. This class previously aired on February 19, 2024.

title: Functional Flow For Spine
description: Build strength and flexibility throughout your entire spine and core in this energizing Vinyasa flow. You’ll practice poses and strengthening elements that help to maintain healthy posture and balanced, functional movements. Highlights include Forearm Plank variations, Revolved Lunge, Locust variations, Revolved Chair, Bow Pose, Standing Side Bend, and Ardha Matseyendrasana (Half Lord Of The Fish/Seated Twist). This class previously aired on February 12, 2024.

title: No Chaturanga Flow
description: This comprehensive Vinyasa practice has everything you need to feel strong, mobile, and grounded without including any Planks or Chaturangs (and very few Down Dogs). Flow through an energizing sequence with Half Sun Salutations, Warriors with shoulder openers, Revolved Half Moon, and Boat Pose. This class previously aired on February 7, 2024.

title: Functional Flow For Hips
description: Build strength and mobility in your hips through this Vinyasa practice that keeps you flowing and breathing. Start with 90/90 variations and an active range of hip openers, then explore a strong Pigeon Pose, Glute Bridges, Anjeneyasana (Crescent), Ardha Hanumanasana (Half Split), and Down Dog hip-flexor transitions. This class previously aired on February 5, 2024.

title: Vibrant Morning Vinyasa
description: Get moving and set a clear, focused tone for your day in this up-tempo practice that’s full of side bends and front-body openers. Enjoy a balanced sequence with One-Legged Down Dog, Sun Salutations, variations in Cobra, Bow, Humble Warrior, and Pigeon, plus the option to go upside down in Handstand or Forearm Balance. This class previously aired on January 31, 2024.

title: Yang Yin For Stress Reduction
description: This practice includes the best of both worlds for stress reduction: a mid-tempo flow to melt tension and focus your mind, plus slow passive holds to downshift your nervous system. Highlights include a Crescent to Half Split flow, outer-hip openers in Bow Pose, Low Lunge Salutations, Lizard Lunge, Gomukhasana, Janu Sirsasana, and seated meditation. This class previously aired on February 14, 2024.

title: Embody Empathy Hatha
description: Lay the groundwork for being more accepting and empathetic toward others in this balanced, nurturing Hatha practice that helps you feel more comfortable and at peace in your body. Start with Happy Baby, Reclined Ankle-To-Knee, and Reclined Twist before moving steadily through Warrior II, Triangle, Wide-Legged Forward Bend, and Bridge Pose. This class previously aired on January 17, 2024.

title: Hatha For Strength & Flexibility
description: For those who want to go deep but aren’t looking to flow, this higher-level Hatha practice is for you. You’ll focus on longer holds and resistance training to simultaneously develop strength and flexibility, targeting your core, hips, quads, and more. Postures include Supta Padangusthasana (Reclined Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose), Pigeon Pose, Makarasana, Low Lunge, One-Arm and One-Leg Planks, Camel Pose, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on January 24, 2024.

title: Vinyasa For Longevity
description: This Vinyasa practice targets three keys to physical longevity: spine and core strength, shoulder mobility, and hip mobility. Flow through a mid-tempo flow with strengtheners and openers built into Lunge Salutations, Warrior II, Warrior I, Parsvottanasana (Pyramid Pose), Wide-Legged Squat, and 90/90. This class previously aired on January 29, 2024.

title: Release Upper Back Hatha
description: Melt tension in your shoulders, neck, and upper body throughout this mild Hatha practice. Feel more comfortable and calm after practicing Child’s Pose, Cat Pose, Lunging Garudasana (Eagle Pose), Wide-Legged Forward Fold, and Lunging Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose). This class previously aired on January 22, 2024.

title: Core Strength Vinyasa
description: This core-focused Vinyasa practice strengthens and tones your center and leaves you feeling refreshed. Flow through a strong, sweat-inducing sequence with Side Plank lifts, challenging Forearm Plank variations, Reclined Bakasana (Reclined Crow Pose), and Navasana (Boat Pose). This class previously aired on January 10, 2024.

title: New Year, New You Flow
description: New year, fresh start. This class guides you into new beginnings by focusing on feeling good in your body. Enjoy a dynamic sequence with just enough flow to stay moving while taking time to release tension in your shoulders, hips, and spine. Highlights include a four-part shoulder sequence, a four-part Pigeon Pose, Lunge Salutations, Ardha Hanumanasana (Half Split), Cobra variations, Navasana (Boat Pose), Firelog Pose, and Parivrtta Janu Sirsasana (Revolved Head-To-Knee Pose). This class previously aired on January 1, 2024.

title: Back Care Hatha
description: Learn how to maintain a neutral, comfortable position with your spine while strengthening your center and mobilizing your hips and shoulders. This slow, relaxing Hatha practice takes you through a Reclined Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose series, upper body variations in Warrior I and Warrior II, and Forearm Plank before finishing with Bridge and Child’s Pose. This class previously aired on December 27, 2023.

title: Gentle Backbends Hatha
description: Stretch your shoulders, quads, and spine in this gentle backhanding practice that leaves you calm and spacious. Flow through a slow, relaxing sequence with Reclined Twist, side-lying postures, Anjeneyasana (Crescent Moon), Ardha Ustrasana (Half Camel Pose), and Supported Bridge. This class previously aired on January 3, 2024.

title: Mind-Body Refresh Flow
description: This up-tempo flow boosts circulation and unwinds full-body tension, leaving you feeling grounded, clear, and refreshed throughout your entire being. Move through a brisk sequence with variations in Lunge Salutations, Down Dog, Revolved Half Moon, Revolved Triangle, Pigeon, and Camel poses. This class previously aired on January 1, 2024.

title: Advanced Arm Balance Flow
description: Enjoy helpful insights to keep moving and breathing while flowing through this challenging sequence that explores a range of arm balances. Stay strong through this higher-level practice that includes Visvamitrasana (a Side Plank arm balance combo), Kapinjalasana (Partridge Pose), Bakasana (Crow Pose), Eka Pada Bakasana (One-Legged Crow Pose), Parsva Bakasana (Side Crow), Eka Pada Galavasana variation (Flying Pigeon Pose), and Mayurasana (Peacock Pose). This class previously aired on January 8, 2024.

title: Intermediate Flow
description: This is the comprehensive 60-minute Vinyasa practice you’ve been waiting for. It addresses your entire body, maintains a steady flow, and provides just enough challenge to keep your mind focused. You’ll finish grounded, content, and refreshed. Highlights include Surya Namaskar A and B (Sun Salutations) variations, core-strengthening work, bound standing postures, Bakasana (Crow Pose), Dhanurasana (Bow Pose), Kapotasana (King Pigeon Pose), and Eka Pada Rajakapotasana (One-Legged King Pigeon Pose). This class previously aired on January 15, 2024.

title: Winter Slow Flow
description: Enjoy taking your time in this grounding, nurturing practice that moves just enough while lingering in postures to savor them; you'll finish feeling better in your entire body. With an emphasis on side bends and shoulder openers, this flow features Dolphin, Forward Fold, Anjeneyasana Salutations, Wide-Legged Squat, Pigeon Pose, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on December 20, 2023.

title: Vinyasa For Yoga Teachers
description: This creative class is designed to help yoga teachers feel like a student again. You’ll simply play, breathe, and enjoy the experience of practice without pressure. Start with reclined hip openers and side bends, then flow steadily through variations of Ardha Hanumanasana, Standing Forward Fold, Halasana, Revolved Triangle, Gomukhasana, and Pigeon Pose. This class previously aired on December 13, 2023.

title: Nighttime Slow Flow
description: Transition from day to night in this slow flow that unwinds the kinks and takes you to a grounded, calm place. Find relaxation in dynamic reclined twists, lunging shoulder-openers, a Pigeon Pose variation, Wide-Legged Squat with a side bend, Plough Pose (Halasana), and Seated Forward Folds. This class previously aired on December 11, 2023.

title: Beginner Flow
description: This dynamic yet accessible practice gets you moving while building strength, flexibility, and comfort in your whole body. Enjoy an energizing flow with Lunge Salutations, Warrior II, Triangle, Crescent Lunge variations, Boat Pose, and hip openers to finish grounded and renewed. This class previously aired on December 18, 2023.

title: Healthy Spine Hatha
description: Move slowly through twists, side bends, flexions, and extensions to gently strengthen your spine and move it in every direction. Enjoy an accessible sequence with simple Plank variations, Anjeneyasana (Low Lunge), Cobra Pose, Side Bow Pose, Bridge Pose, and Janu Sirsasana (Head-To-Knee Forward Fold). This class previously aired on November 29, 2023.

title: Hatha For Serenity
description: This simple, relaxing sequence features shoulder opening, hip opening, and basic pranayama (breathwork) to help you feel calm and grounded. Move slowly through seated side bends, Low Lunge variations, Down Dog, Headstand, and Shoulderstand to generate a serene state of being. This class previously aired on November 27, 2023.

title: Inversions For Focus
description: Focus your mind and cultivate grounding in this Hatha practice that covers the four primary inversions — Handstand, Forearm Balance, Headstand, and Shoulderstand. Move steadily through a shoulder-opening Lunge series, Wide-Legged Forward Bend, and Standing Forward Bend before practicing the inversions. This class previously aired on November 20, 2023.

title: Strong Foundations Flow
description: Establish a strong foundation for your practice in this balanced Vinyasa flow that incorporates essential poses from every posture family — Sun Salutations, standing postures, arm balances, backbends, twists, and forward folds. Key poses include Warriors, Side Angle, Bridge, Ardha Matsyendrasana (Seated Twist), and Janu Sirsasana (Head-To-Knee Pose). This class previously aired on December 4, 2023.

title: Slow Flow: Hips
description: This slow flow unwinds tension in the entirety of your hips, from the hip flexors to the outer hips and hamstrings. Follow a controlled pace through Double Pigeon, Malasana (Squat), Half Split, Gomukhasana, and more hip-focused poses with time to linger in each one. Though gentle, this practice can also be slightly challenging. This class previously aired on November 13, 2023.

title: Stress-Free Holiday Hatha
description: Simply focus on the present moment as you nurture yourself and release stress in this slow-moving Hatha class. Let go of life’s pressures while relaxing into reclined twists, reclined hip openers, seated forward folds, Gate Pose, Child’s Pose, and shoulder opening variations. This class previously aired on November 15, 2023.

title: Slow Flow: Spine
description: This slow flow takes your spine through a range of motion with side bends, twists, backbends, and forward bends. Follow a controlled pace through Anjeneyasana, Lunges, Cobra Pose, Camel Pose, Revolved Triangle, Bridge, and Upward Bow. Use rhythmic breathing and enjoy some time to savor each pose. Though gentle, this practice can also be slightly challenging. This class previously aired on November 1, 2023.

title: Evening Wind Down Hatha
description: This soothing practice begins by offsetting the demands of your day with slow, gentle half Sun Salutations and mild backbends, then ground down with an array of hip openers and twists. Poses include Sphinx, Bridge, Pigeon, Seated Side Bend, and Lizard Lunge. This class previously aired on October 30, 2023.

title: Full-Body Strength Hatha
description: Maximize power in your core, spine, shoulders, glutes, and hamstrings throughout this strength-building practice. Move steadily through a reclined arm balance series, Locust Pose variations, Boat Pose variations, Dolphin, Forearm Balance, and Side Plank variations. This class previously aired on November 8, 2023.

title: Daily Vinyasa Flow
description: This go-to, balanced sequence helps your body feel better from head to toe. You’ll move at a consistent, dynamic pace without feeling rushed. Enjoy postures that address your hips, spine, core, and shoulders, including Lunge Salutations, Half Moon, Standing Twists, Pigeon Pose variations, Camel Pose, and Boat Pose variations. This class previously aired on November 6, 2023.

title: Advanced Flow
description: This strong, mid-tempo flow inspires you while strengthening your body with creative variations of Sun Salutations, arm balances, inversions, and backbends. Postures include Bird of Paradise, Kapotasana, Handstand, Forearm Stand, One-Legged Upward Bow Pose, and Inverted Staff Pose. This class previously aired on December 6, 2023.

title: Yang Yin For Balance
description: Start with 25 minutes of a continuous Vinyasa flow, followed by 20 minutes of grounding hip-openers, hamstring-openers, and meditation. This class brings you into balance by utilizing movement and stillness equally. Posses include Revolved Crescent Lunge, Bound Side Angle, Upward Bow, Boat, Gomukhasana, and Janu Sirsasana. This class previously aired on October 25, 2023.

title: Shoulder Mobility Flow
description: Create more flexibility and comfort in your shoulders with this dynamic sequence that blends active and passive range of motion techniques. Warm up with Gomukhasana and Garudasana variations, then flow steadily through Crescent Salutations, Parivritta Janu Sirsasana (Revolved Head-To-Knee Pose), and Bound Side Angle Pose. This class previously aired on October 11, 2023.

title: Steady Breath, Steady Mind Flow
description: Drop into a steady state, using rhythmic breathing to focus your mind and ground the nervous system. This flow emphasizes shoulder and hip-opening to leave you feeling fully balanced. Move through Lunge Salutations with twists, Revolved Chair Pose, Revolved Triangle, Revolved Pigeon, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on September 27, 2023.

title: Self-Awareness Hatha
description: Become more aware of your body, breath, and mind in this Hatha practice that focuses on standing balances. Move steadily through Tree Pose, Gomukhasana, Warrior III, Revolved Half Moon, and Bird of Paradise. This class previously aired on September 13, 2023.

title: Short On Time Flow
description: This strong, balanced flow lengthens and strengthens your whole body without feeling rushed. Move through an energizing sequence with Low Lunge Salutations, Warrior II, Bound Half Moon, Revolved Triangle, Boat Pose, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on October 4, 2023.

title: Satya Flow
description: Flow through this practice for a balanced sequence that moves your body while offering space for self-reflection and responsiveness to your needs. Embrace the concept of Satya (essence or truth) in Sun Salutation variations, Warrior I with shoulder-openers, Revolved Triangle, Camel, and Upward Bow Pose. This class previously aired on October 18, 2023.

title: Front Body Expansion Hatha
description: Release tension in every inch of your front body, including your hip flexors, quads, pecs, and deltoids, while moving steadily through Crescent Lunge, Low Lunge, Purvottanasana (Upward Plank), Table Top, Side-Lying Locust, and Side-Lying Bow. You’ll finish feeling revitalized. This class previously aired on September 4, 2023.

title: Hamstring Release Hatha
description: Explore several techniques that release tension and restriction in your hamstrings and inner legs, helping to increase flexibility in forward bends. This Hatha practice leaves you feeling more comfort in your body after moving steadily through Supta Padangusthasana (Reclined Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose), Ardha Hanumanasana (Half Split), Down Dog, Wide-Legged Squat, and Krounchasana (Heron Pose). This class previously aired on August 28, 2023.

title: Dissolve Stress Flow
description: Just flow without any rush, slowing down to settle into breath-led postures. This practice offers much-needed stress relief by simply focusing on movement that lets you unwind, soften, and let go of the weight of the world. Highlights include side bends, twists, Lizard Lunge, Half Split, Salutations, and Pigeon. This class previously aired on August 16, 2023.

title: Power Of Repetition Flow
description: This challenging whole-body flow focuses your mind (and brings the heat!) through a consistent repetition of strong standing poses, arm balances, and backbends. Postures include Half Bound Triangle, Handstand, Bakasana (Crow Pose), Utthita Hasta Padangusthasana (Extended Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose), and Warrior II with Eagle Arms. This class previously aired on September 6, 2023.

title: Advanced Vinyasa Flow
description: This strong, comprehensive practice challenges your entire body and allows you to refine all your postures. It’s a great go-to class that builds physical and mental stamina. Highlights include dynamic Pyramid Pose, Sun Salutations, Standing Splits, Boat Pose, Handstand, Forearm Balance, Eka Pada Koundinyasana (arm balance), and one-legged backbend variations. This class previously aired on August 30, 2023.

title: Classic Vinyasa Flow
description: This old-school Vinyasa flow works your entire body and lets you settle into each posture — the perfect pace to keep moving while focusing on the deep details of each pose. Start with seated shoulder openers, then enjoy a steady flow with Sun Salutations, Half Moon, Handstand, Forearm Balance, and Crow Pose before rounding out with Shoulderstand and Upward Bow. This class previously aired on September 11, 2023.

title: Simple & Effective Hatha
description: This full-body practice allows time for holding postures a little longer to go a little deeper. Enjoy a balanced, comprehensive sequence with Anjaneyasana (Crescent Moon), Revolved Triangle, Revolved Side Angle, Revolved Half Moon, Headstand, Shoulderstand, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on August 9, 2023.

title: Be Here Now Flow
description: This strong flow has minimal instruction so that you can create your own experience, focusing on sensations and quieting mental chatter. Down Dog variations, Sun Salutation variations, Bakasana (Crow Pose), Side Plank variations, King Pigeon, and Bow Pose will leave you energized and a little sweaty. This class previously aired on August 21, 2023.

title: Chest & Shoulders Flow
description: This is a slower flow that lets you move, breathe, and unwind tension in your shoulders, neck, chest, and back. Enjoy upper body releasing variations throughout Crescent Lunge, Low Lunge, Puppy Pose, Triangle, Side Angle, Locust, and Bow Pose. This class previously aired on August 7, 2023.

title: Side Crow Flow
description: Build the skill and learn three ways to safely set up Parsva Bakasana (Side Crow Pose) in this steady flow. Enhance your strength with a Pigeon variation, Revolved Side Angle, Lunge Salutations, and core work to prepare for Side Crow Pose. This class also includes important technical considerations for the advanced arm balance. This class previously aired on July 31, 2023.

title: Side Body Hatha
description: Release tension in the entire side seam of your body, from your IT band to your outer hips, lower back, lats, and shoulders. Flow through side bends and variations in Reclined Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose, Gomukhasana (Cow Face Pose), Parighasana (Gate Pose), Triangle Pose, and Revolved Head-To-Knee Pose. This class previously aired on July 17, 2023.

title: Feet-Focused Flow
description: Learn how to refine your body's actions in yoga’s most essential postures. This dynamic flow helps you understand how to use your feet and ankles more skillfully while releasing tension in those areas. Practice Vajrasana with toe-opening variations and plantar fascia release, Chair Pose, Low Lunge Salutations, Half Moon, and Wide-Legged Forward Bend with technical cues throughout. This class previously aired on July 24, 2023.

title: Mindful Morning Flow
description: Explore key elements of mindfulness in this balanced, comprehensive morning flow. You’ll focus on opening your shoulders and quads with side bends, kneeling and lunging twists, and accessible backbends. Highlights include Low Lunge Salutations, standing postures, Dhanurasana (Bow Pose), Revolved Triangle, and Gate Pose. This class previously aired on July 19, 2023.

title: Back To Basics Vinyasa
description: Get back to basics and return your focus to the fundamentals of Vinyasa yoga in this steady, progressive flow of Sun Salutations and essential poses. Highlights include Lunge, Locust, Warrior II, Side Angle, Triangle, and Bridge poses. This class previously aired on August 2, 2023.

title: Full Spectrum Flow
description: From Sun Salutations to core strengtheners to arm balances and inversions, this comprehensive practice includes a wide range of postures to challenge you and lean into your edge. Follow a strong flow with Revolved Chair, Forearm Plank, Eka Pada Galavasana (arm balance), Handstand, and Upward Bow Pose (Wheel). This class previously aired on July 12, 2023.

title: Lower Back Stability Hatha
description: This Hatha practice aims to stabilize your lower back by increasing hip mobility and building strength around the lumbar spine. Begin with Reclined Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose variations, then move through Bird Dogs, Warrior II, Plank variations, and Locust. This class previously aired on July 3, 2023.

title: Start Here Hatha
description: This Hatha practice focuses on several of yoga’s most essential postures while targeting your core, shoulders, and hips. Explore cross-legged poses, Down Dog, Plank, Child’s Pose, Warrior II, Side Angle Pose, and Bridge with beginner-friendly cues along the way. This class previously aired on June 26, 2023.

title: Midday Recharge Flow
description: Boost your energy in this smooth, dynamic sequence that opens your front body and strengthens your back body. Enjoy a feel-good, higher-level flow with backbends, arm balances, inversions, and side bends. Postures include Bow Pose, Ardha Chandra Chapasana (Half Moon variation), Kapinjalasana (Partridge Pose), Pincha Mayurasana (Forearm Balance), and Vrischikasana (Forearm Balance with a backbend). This class previously aired on July 10, 2023.

title: Energizing Flow
description: Boost your energy and make it last in this Vinyasa practice that follows a continuous, up-tempo pace. Flow through a strong, dynamic sequence that starts with hip openers and leads to Boat, Chair, Side Crow, Handstand, and Kapotasana (a deep, kneeling backbend). This class previously aired on July 5, 2023.

title: Hip-Opening Hatha
description: Release tension in every inch of your hips with this relaxing Hatha class that leaves you grounded and comfortable in your body. Warm up with mild Sun Salutations, then explore postures to open your outer hips, hamstrings, and hip flexors before finishing with reclined poses. This class previously aired on June 12, 2023.

title: Slow Down Hatha
description: Experience deep relaxation in this nurturing Hatha practice that helps you slow down to unwind tension and release stress. Enjoy reclined hip and hamstring openers, seated shoulder openers, and the option for Headstand, Shoulderstand, or inversion alternates. Finish with breathwork and a guided Savasana. This class previously aired on June 7, 2023.

title: Energy Reset Flow
description: This class has everything you need to uplift your energy — standing pose flows, accessible arm balances, and backbends. Stimulate your circulation and wake up your body through a strength-building, sustained tempo of dynamic movement. This class previously aired on June 14, 2023.

title: Strong Inversions Flow
description: Fine-tune your inversion game with this Vinyasa practice. You’ll work on increasing your skills to reach Handstand with challenges like arm balance to Tripod Headstand transitions. Warm up with Lunge Salutations and Forearm Plank variations, then flow through a sweaty, technique-building inversion sequence. This class previously aired on June 28, 2023.

title: Powerful Morning Flow
description: Build core strength and endurance while enhancing your focus and moving your entire body — everything you need to kickstart a powerful day. This strong, all-around practice includes Low Lunge Salutations, Boat Pose, Bakasana (Crow Pose), Humble Warrior, Forearm Stand, Handstand, and One-Legged Upward Bow. Modifications are offered for the more advanced postures. This class previously aired on June 21, 2023.

title: Stretch It Out Hatha
description: Unwind, unravel, and simply let tightness go. This stretchy Hatha practice gets to all the spots holding tension — hips, spine, quads, hamstrings, and shoulders. Highlights include Eagle Arms, Puppy Pose, Dolphin, Lizard, Pigeon variations, Gomukhasana, Revolved Head-To-Knee Pose, and reclined twists. This class is perfect for the evening, after a hard workout or training session, and after traveling. This class previously aired on May 24, 2023.

title: Breath To Movement Flow
description:
Highlights: Foundational postures and techniques, stretchy, strengthening. 

Discover how to move dynamically without sacrificing the quality of your breath. This all-around flow takes you through core-strengthening and hip-mobility-boosting postures while developing your ability to truly move with your breath. Highlights include Boat Pose, Low Lunge Salutations, Warrior II, Triangle, Half Moon, and Half Split. This class previously aired on June 19, 2023

title: Intermediate Flow
description: This all-encompassing full-body flow establishes a rhythmic breath pattern with simple poses, then builds energy to explore dynamic poses. Begin with Crescent Moon, Boat variations, and Side Plank variations leading to Revolved Half Moon, optional Handstand, Warrior III, and Camel Pose. This class previously aired on June 5, 2023.

title: Ease Joint Pain Flow
description: Moving any amount you can — with intention and moderation — is key in this gentle Vinyasa practice. Joint pain is very common yet presents a broad spectrum of challenges, and this class meets you with lots of modifications and intensity levels so that you can find a balance between getting your circulation moving without overdoing it. Postures include Reclined Hand-To-Foot Pose, Dolphin, Lunges, Half Split, Warrior II with Eagle Arms, Side Angle, Bridge, and seated folds. This class previously aired on May 17, 2023.

title: Hip Flexor Relief Flow
description: This targeted Vinyasa flow focuses on finding relief in your hip flexors and quads. It’s an enjoyable standalone class or is perfect as a warm-up for a longer back-bending practice. Postures include Lunges, Chair, Bound Half Moon, Warrior II, Bow Pose, Partridge Pose (Kapinjalasana), and Pigeon. This class previously aired on May 29, 2023.

title: Find Equilibrium Flow
description: Recalibrate your mind and body in this full-spectrum Vinyasa flow, which evenly distributes your focus and energy from posture to posture. Begin with Ratio Breathing (6 counts in, 6 counts out), then practice Locust, Chair, Side Angle, an optional Handstand, Warrior III, and Half Lotus. This class previously aired on May 22, 2023.

title: Support Digestion Flow
description: Practice core-focused postures, twists, side bending, and breathwork in this Vinyasa flow. These practices help to boost circulation and encourage relaxation, which are essential in supporting your bodily systems. Poses include Bound Angle, Bird Dog, Revolved Crescent, Revolved Chair, Bow, and Boat. This class previously aired on May 8, 2023.

title: Go-To Vinyasa Flow
description: Move swiftly in this breath-led practice to just get to it and flow, but without feeling rushed. Stretch and strengthen through Revolved Low Lunge, Bound Side Angle, Half Moon, Fallen Triangle, Hand-To-Big-Toe Pose, Figure Four Chair, and Bow Pose, then finish in reclined twists. Tip: Save this class to your favorites for quick access. This class previously aired on May 15, 2023.

title: Mindful May Series: Steady Breath Flow
description: Promote overall wellness and vitality in this Vinyasa practice that uses consistent, rhythmic breathing synchronized with dynamic movement — a great class to repeat time and again. Highlights include Boat variations, Half Bound Triangle, Revolved Half Moon, Handstand Hops, Eka Pada Koundinyasana II (Flying Splits), and Supine Figure Four. This class previously aired on May 10, 2023 as a part of Glo’s Mindful May Series.

title: Hatha For Longevity
description: This class helps reduce stress, strengthen your back-body, and boost circulation with simple repetitive movements — three aspects contributing to longevity. Begin with Bird Dog and Leg Lifts in Locust and Plank before practicing Forward Fold and standing postures. Finish in Bridge, Spinal Twist, and Savasana, feeling a boost in your wellness game. This class previously aired on May 1, 2023.

title: Handstand Flow
description: This strength-building flow progresses to Handstand (option to use a wall) and can be suited for you whether or not you have the skill of going upside down. Explore the many details that contribute to Handstand Pose while moving through Low Lunge, Plank variations, Humble Warrior, Handstand Hops, and Forearm Stand. Round out with Child’s Pose and Seated Folds to finish. This class previously aired on April 24, 2023.

title: Stable Foundation Hatha
description: Create the building blocks for a growing practice by establishing a solid base in postures with your breath. Begin class with seated breathwork, then move through Lunges, Wide-Legged Forward Fold, Warrior II, Revolved Triangle, and Bridge. This is an excellent opportunity to expand your practice by creating ease for yourself as you learn. This class previously aired on April 19, 2023.

title: Reduce Fatigue Hatha
description: Gently lift yourself out of a sleepy state, building momentum and energy throughout this slowly progressing class. Shift your attention from fatigue to fully surrendering into active engagement within postures while practicing Seated Fold variations, Pigeon, Lizard, Handstand, and Half Lotus. This class previously aired on April 17, 2023.

title: Manage Chronic Pain Flow
description:
Chronic pain can hijack your relationship with your body, similar to when a song hijacks your mind. Instead of addressing different types of chronic pain, this class helps to call your attention to areas of your body that are functioning well while moving slowly through a gentle flow that includes modifications throughout. Postures include Forward Fold, Chair, Forearm Plank, Side Angle, Warrior II, and Bridge. This class previously aired on April 12, 2023.

Please note: This class does not treat chronic pain but rather helps to address your relationship to chronic pain. We recommend consulting a medical professional for holistic treatment.

title: Increase Circulation Flow
description: Move your body to encourage circulation in this balanced, strong Vinyasa practice that has a little bit of everything for everyone — standing postures, standing balances, arm balances, and inversions. Poses include Boat, Warriors, Triangle, Flying Crow, One-Legged Side Plank, Handstand, Camel, and Savasana. This class previously aired on April 26, 2023.

title: Flow For Strength
description: This all-encompassing, full-body flow builds strength through a skillful use of movement and breathwork. Highlights include a Plank series (Forearm and Side Planks), Locust, Chair Pose, Boat Pose, Crow variations, Bound Angle, and Bridge variations. This class previously aired on May 3, 2023.

title: Restore Focus Hatha
description: Move through this challenging yet accessible sequence to anchor your fleeting mind with the demand of postures. Strengthen your attention while practicing Triangle, Warrior III, Chair, Crow, and an inversion of your choice, then finish with reclined twists feeling connected to yourself and the present moment. This class previously aired on April 10, 2023.

title: Strengthen To Lengthen Flow
description: This class covers one of Jason’s favorite topics to teach — co-creating strength, control, and flexibility. Feel your muscles engage in elongated positions as you practice Boat Pose, Low Lunge, Pigeon, Wide Squat, Figure Four Chair, Half Cow Face Pose, and Seated Straddle. This class previously aired on April 5, 2023.

title: Unlock Low Back Hatha
description: This Hatha practice relieves tightness in your low back with side bending postures and twists, and by focusing on elongating the front body (hip flexors, psoas, and quads). It makes for a great go-to class whenever your low back is stiff. Highlights include Low Lunge variations, a Gate Pose variation, Revolved Warrior I, Revolved Triangle, and Revolved Head-To-Knee Pose. Please note: This class is for those with a stiff low back looking to relieve discomfort and does not support low back injury management. This class previously aired on April 3, 2023.

title: Grounding Restorative
description: Feel your entire body soften and relax through Supta Baddha Konasana (Reclined Butterfly Pose), Supta Sukhasana (Reclined Easy Pose), Child’s Pose, and Legs Up The Wall. Then, store these sensations in your muscle memory so that you can access them time and time again. Grab props like bolsters, pillows, or cushions to support you in finding complete comfort. This class previously aired on August 14, 2023.

title: Hatha Foundations
description: Build a sustainable practice with this class that illustrates the value of learning Hatha foundations and doing them well. As Jason says, “Fundamental does not mean easy. The fundamentals are a lifelong practice.” Poses include Warriors, Wide-Legged Standing Forward Bend, Triangle, Revolved Half Moon, and Camel. Enjoy a special appearance from Jason’s dog, too! This class previously aired on March 15, 2023.

title: Happy Knees Hatha
description: Support your knee health in this class by focusing on strengthening and elongating your quads and outer hips with easy-to-access poses favorable to sensitive knees. Highlights include Reclining Hand-To-Big-Toe-Pose with a strap, a Pigeon variation, Chair Pose, Warrior II, Wide-Legged Fold, and a Bridge variation. Please note: This class does not treat specific knee injuries; it focuses on targeting the outer and posterior hip in ways that do not trigger knee pain. This class previously aired on March 22, 2023.

title: Advance Your Flow
description: Shake up your routine by exploring challenging postures, including backbends, inversions, and arm balances. Embrace transitions that harness your strength and endurance while building heat in Sun Salutations, Handstand Hops, Bird of Paradise, Crow Pose, Forearm Balance, One-Legged King Pigeon, and Inverted Staff Pose. This class previously aired on March 27, 2023.

title: Hatha For Emotional Well-being
description: Monitor and observe your inner dialogue under the demand of long-held postures in this feel-good Hatha practice. Gain tools to remain steady in the face of life’s discomforts while exploring a seated shoulder-opening series, Sphinx, Pigeon, and options to invert, then finish with an extended Savasana or seated meditation. This class previously aired on February 27, 2023.

title: Flow To Regulate
description: This Vinyasa class is formulated to feel like a moving pranayama practice. Follow a comprehensive flow that maintains a steady pace while concentrating on your breath to guide you through the sequence. Key poses include Humble Warrior, Side Plank, Crow, Boat, Shoulderstand, and Gomukhasana. This class previously aired on March 13, 2023.

title: Connect To Core Flow
description: Emphasize your power by working the entire circumference of your trunk — posterior, core, and paraspinal. This strengthening Vinyasa flow challenges you through Side Plank and Forearm Plank variations, Boat Pose, Sphinx, and Eka Pada Bakasana (One-Legged Crow Pose). This class previously aired on March 20, 2023.

title: Connect To Breath Hatha
description: Practice breathing skillfully while moving through just a few postures and a breath-focused visualization. Start seated with side bending stretches and deep breathing, then explore a sequence with a Lizard variation, Warriors, Pigeon, Seated Straddle, and Seated Twists. This class previously aired on February 22, 2023.

title: Work Smarter Flow
description: This comprehensive Vinyasa flow invites you to approach familiar movements using a new way of thinking. Find the sweet spot between effort and technique by being extra mindful through transitions. Highlights include Sun Salutations, Plank hold, Revolved Crescent, Revolved Half Moon, Pigeon, and Wheel. This class previously aired on February 20, 2023.

title: Nourish Your Joints Flow
description: Facilitate circulation throughout your entire body in this joint-friendly class that flows through continuous movement. Practice Double Pigeon, Half Split variations, and Skandasana, then finish with Camel, Bridge, and Wheel poses. This class previously aired on March 1, 2023.

title: Posterior Strength Flow
description: This strong, breath-guided flow strengthens your posterior muscles (spine, shoulders, hamstrings, glutes) and your core. Start with Salutations to warm up, then focus on specific muscle activation with Plank variations, Locust, Lunges, Warrior III, Revolved Crescent, and Half Splits. We recommend complementing this class with Anterior Strength Flow for a comprehensive practice. This class previously aired on February 15, 2023.

title: Balanced Mind Hatha
description: This Hatha practice begins by focusing on the breath-to-movement connection, then moves through standing balances, accessible inversions (with options), and seated twists to round out — just the right amount of intensity to stay present without being overworked. Highlights include Sun Salutations, Warrior II & III, Half Moon, and Dolphin or Headstand. This class previously aired on February 13, 2023.

title: Anterior Strength Flow
